snippet.title: Zombie Run HD #4 | ODD ZOMBIE & BEARDMAN Gameplay! By RetroStyle Games
snippet.description:
Zombie Run HD #4 | ODD ZOMBIE & BEARDMAN Gameplay! 
By RetroStyle Games

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/zombie-run-hd/id535003306?mt=8

Description
HAVE FUN OR DIE TRYING
More than 20 million players already enjoyed the most exciting undying runner! They could be wrong, but probably aren't. Be sure to download and check for yourself!

Help awaken Zombies to escape from The Rusty Mug, a bar accidentally built atop an old temple cemetery.

Featuring:
- Brainless controls!
- Aztec Temple location - to run even longer!
- Dozen of Unique characters!
- The Unbrave One zombie, Vampirella and Undead Assassin!
- ALSO featuring Bad Santa, Zuperman and Iron Zombie!
- Jaw-dropping graphics!
- Lot of fun!

And remember: zombies! They are cool.

What's New

Happy holidays:
- 6 NEW Characters: Zcooby Doo, Frozen King, Donut Lover, Zombario, Invader Z and Predatorz
- Zcooby Doo textures should be fixed now
- Better Water shaders

Don't forget to rate Zombie Run and check our other games.
Thank you!
